item.description:
Desfina is listed as one of hidden Boston's gems. I thought it would be fun to check it out. Its a neighborhood restaurant with good food and reasonable prices. If that doesn't entice you, there's a dish on the menu where a waiter brings a piece of cheese and lights it on fire - this is worth going to just to see the cheese light on fire. Check out their home page. They describe the restaurant better than I can: www.desfina.com

Unfortunately they don't have the greek music and dancing any more, but.....
It should still be a good time. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign on the table

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Desfina Greek Restaurant
